description: New Jersey tea (Ceanothus americanus) is an amazing native plant species that grows throughout the eastern United States. It features beautiful white blossoms that make it an attractive addition to any garden, as well as its sweet smell. It is a hardy plant, so it can survive even in the driest of conditions. It is an excellent low maintenance plant, making it a great choice for even the novice gardener. It's also known to be a great source of nectar for birds and other insects. The leaves of the New Jersey tea are known to be high in antioxidants, making it a great addition to teas, wines, and medicinal products. The bark can be used to make a tea as well. All in all, New Jersey tea is an amazing plant that provides great benefits to both people and the environment.
